00011 template <>
00012 vector<Rect> MxArray::toVector<Rect>() const
00013 {
00014     vector<Rect> vr;
00015     if (isNumeric())
00016         vr.push_back(toRect());
00017     else if (isCell()) {
00018         int n = numel();
00019         vector<MxArray> vm(toVector<MxArray>());
00020         vr.reserve(n);
00021         for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
00022             vr.push_back(vm[i].toRect());
00023     }
00024     else
00025         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid input");
00026     return vr;
00027 }
00028 
00036 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00037                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00038 {
00039     // Check the number of arguments
00040     if (nrhs<2 || (nrhs%2)!=0 || nlhs>1)
00041         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00042     
00043     // Argument vector
00044     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00045     vector<Rect> rectList(rhs[0].toVector<Rect>());
00046     int groupThreshold = rhs[1].toInt();
00047     double eps=0.2;
00048     
00049     for (int i=2; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00050         string key(rhs[i].toString());
00051         if (key=="EPS")
00052             eps = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00053         else
00054             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option %s", key.c_str());
00055     }
00056     
00057     groupRectangles(rectList,groupThreshold,eps);
00058     plhs[0] = MxArray(rectList);
00059 }
